com.camerontec.util.collection.persisted

Interface IPersistentByteArrayStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, IByteArrayStore, IVersionedSizedStore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsynchronousPersistentByteArrayStore, ExternallyIndexedJournalingPersistentStore, HighCapacityIndexedJournalingPersistentStore, IndexedJournalingPersistentStore, InMemoryIndexingJournalingPersistentStore, JournalingPersistentStoreBase, LockingPersistentByteArrayStoreDecorator, MappedJournalingPersistentStore, SyncingAndLockingByteArrayStoreDecorator

    public interface IPersistentByteArrayStore
extends IByteArrayStore
    Extension of the basic IByteArrayStore to add persistence based operations.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.camerontec.util.collection.IByteArrayStore

        IByteArrayStore.IKeyHandler, IByteArrayStore.ReadRequest, IByteArrayStore.WriteRequest

    • Method Detail

      • flushToDisk

        void flushToDisk()
        Flush the store to the underlying disk.

        On successful return the contents of the store are guaranteed to be synchronized with the underlying disk.

      • delete

        void delete()
        Delete the underlying files used by the store.

      • refresh

        void refresh()
        Reload the store's contents from disk.

        void close()
    throws PersistenceIOException
